data.author: Attila Tarbaly

changelog.release_notes:
If you set to empty the City in the Settings then It will use GPS location
You can set the "Units" in the Settings. The temperature will be Fahrenheit and the wind will be miles/hour.
Rearrange/Resize the Temp min/max in case of bigger values.

First version.
Smart weather - Weather with health data.

Weather:
Current temperature,
Weather descripiton,
Daily min/max temperature,
Wind speed in km/h
Cloud in %, Rainfall in mm

Health:
Daily steps, 
Daily distance in m,
Daily active time
Sleep time,
Deep sleep time,
Daily Calorie consumption

Time:
Date, number of the week, Name of the day,
Sunrise time,
Sunset time

latest_release.release_notes:
If you set to empty the City in the Settings then It will use GPS location
You can set the "Units" in the Settings. The temperature will be Fahrenheit and the wind will be miles/hour.

data.title: Smart Weather
